about.welcomeParagraph: Welcome to my amazing digital portfolio! My name is Andy, and I am an artist, animator, programmer and gamedev. If you're here, then that's probably because you're a big fan of me. Well if you want my autograph, then you can download my resume. That's close enough, right?

testimonials.noTestimonials: No testimonials here... That means you can be the first!
